Reviews.Title: “Worth the Stay when in Rome”
Reviews.Author: nj103
Reviews.Content: friend stayed casa la salle rome dec 26 2011 5 days clean close bus stop subway little bit confuse button push gate day city checking receptionist button push gate curfew receptionist night transportation airport free overall clean stay visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Nice budget stay in western Rome”
Reviews.Author: Kristina H
Reviews.Content: looked hotel western rome found casa la salle positive reviews trip advisor found catholic guest home near metro cornelia line pleasant hotel nice efficient staff situated lovely park noise busy traffic basic clean beds comfortable lift floor easy access wheelchairs inside hotel hill upwards park gate ample breakfast served restaurant somewhat noisy internet access day email ban facebook chat sites bus 46 minutes hotel center rome passing vatican city

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay in Rome!”
Reviews.Author: TorontofunintheSun
Reviews.Content: wonderful staff clean maintained comfortable beds excellent buffet breakfast couple subway stops vatican walk wonderful peaceful grounds 3 3 families kids ranging age 9 18 happy isnt 5 star luxurious hotel simply excellent safe clean stay economic rate recharge yourself level visit eternal city

Reviews.Title: “Simple, great location, great breakfast, comfortable”
Reviews.Author: junebug619
Reviews.Content: hotel run christian brothers casa la salle stay youre looking amazing luxury incredible amenities comfortable bed clean bathroom location casa la salle choice trip nearest subway stop 5 minute walk hotel nearest grocery store 2 food corner advised queen sized beds double beds double mean single beds youre looking share bed youll pretty cramped space beds comfortable staff bathrooms clean complimentary breakfast absolutely delicious fresh croissants hot italian espresso week sick eating morning youd little variety breakfast food recommend spelling street corner spent money highly recommend hot cocoa liked mass offered attached chapel arent services worth look chapel beauty casa la salle perfect purpose trip simple clean location

Reviews.Title: “Good price, great room.”
Reviews.Author: Eubbie
Reviews.Content: travel rome twice yearly business stay casa lasalle hotel owned located grounds brothers christian schools brothers teaching hotel originally housing simple incredibly clean private bathrooms single beds desk wardrobe bedside table airconditioned prefer windows evening breeze cool beds comfortable free internet service available computer terminals provided floor breakfast included price basic italian offerings meats cheeses fresh fruit grown grounds juice yogurt breads cereal etc coffee machine makes cappuccino espresso café americano etc request freshly cappuccino espresso wait staff hotel restaurant serves lunch dinner daily cost 15 euros added hotel bill inform hotel desk couple hours prior service plan eat restaurant meals chef’s choice typically courses antipasto course pasta course meat vegetable course it’s hit miss sometimes it’s fabulous sometimes it’s soso menu posted front desk park facility beautiful walking paths newly resurfaced museum contains artifacts founder chapel home relics founder saints mass held daily 700 am casa la salle located touristy city it’s block grocery store market located street inexpensive excellent restaurants couple blocks it’s quick block walk metro seven minute ride vatican city cab stand located 2 ½ blocks pick hotel pay cost trip cab stand front door hotel car service fumicino cost reasonable 30 euros
